channel.title: R.I.P Enkrona
channel.description:
Live fast, die young. Sadly, this is the fate of Enkrona. We all had a good time, and I regret it coming to this. If it werent for all of the hackers, we wouldn't be in this position. I want to thank everyone for encouraging me along the way. Enkrona came so far in such a short time. I guess it was just too good to be true. Enkrona won't be online and owned by me again. I will release it to the public, so everyone can still enjoy the legend that Enkrona was. I guess this is the final farewell. I hope you all had fun.
R.I.P Enkrona. A hero is never forgotten, but a legend never dies.
